description:
Tanner is a scoundrel.
You can tell he is a good guy, but has a mischievous streak a mile wide, usually with the ultimate goal of getting in a girl's pants.
He lives in a frat house, complete with a stripper pole in his bedroom.
You might find this information unappealing, but I am guessing his adorable looks and bubbly personality help him squeak by any over the top behavior, and you can tell its all in naughty fun.
He loves porn, and though gay porn wasn't his dream, he's eager to work in the industry and of course, make a lot more than he could in straight films.
title: Tanner - Solo
